video.title: Demo Days - Creating a GitHub app
video.subtitle: Steve Winton, Partner Engineer, explains why someone might want to build a GitHub app, then builds one from scratch. Create 3rd party integrations to GitHub via the API and allow them to act autonomously on protected resources.
